data.title: Venus on the Half Shell

data.text:
London: Granada / W. H. Allen, 1982. Reprint. Softcover. Pocket-sized paperback. 208pp. Philip Jose Farmer writing as 'Kilgore Trout,' the hack science fiction writer character from the novels of Kurt Vonnegut. Cover illustration by Gareth Williams. Spine slightly leaned & creased, pages toned, a few small minor creases to wrappers, old bookseller stamp & black felt-tip pen mark on front free endpaper, text block cracked between pages 56 & 57 but holding solid, slight crease to title-page, else a near-VG copy. Item #50521

ISBN: 9780586054543
